casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Travis J. MONTANA Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 28, 2018

Jodi Zils Gagne, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Ronald G. Weller, senior assistant stale's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 261, 178 A.3d 1119 (2018), is denied.
